description:
Each lesson guides you through inspiring stories of various women who, by stepping out in bold ways, have found success and fulfillment in both their personal and professional lives. The Be BOLDER Mentor and instructor for this course, Colleen Slaughter, also shares her personal experiences with naming and claiming success while facilitating an online coaching environment. These stories of women are presented to highlight how very different BOLDER moves might be for each one of us, and how all of us have the power to step out of the 'stuck' and into a whole new world of possibility.

The Be BOLDER Blueprint is specifically designed to inspire and guide female leaders and entrepreneurs to meet their goals and fulfill their visions. This online course will take you through specific steps to clarify what you want and why, believing that you deserve to have these things manifest. You will also learn to put in place activities that will get you closer to where you want to be. If you're ready for the next level â€“ then this course is for you!

Through The Be BOLDER Blueprint videos and PDFs, you will learn the principles of getting what you want by cultivating the mindset and learning the roadmap for stepping out of what you don't want.

The course follows The BOLDER System and begins with the foundations for believing in yourself. Next comes prioritizing your goals and understanding what specifically could be stopping you from achieving your dreams. After developing practices that will drive you closer to your vision, you will move to accepting and celebrating the happier, more fulfilled you!
title: Be BOLDER Blueprint
